SCTX:
Begin treedeadScript

;this script removes dead trees when ashstorms not active, activates when active

short doOnce

if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( MournWeather != 7 )
		Disable
		set doOnce to 0
	endif
endif

( GetDisabled == 1 )
	if ( MournWeather == 7 )
		if ( doOnce == 0 )
			Enable
			set doOnce to 1
		endif
	endif
endif
	



End treedeadScript
